message.body: Thank you!!! Yeah I could deal with the hair anymore. It just kept tangled and was so dry that I just went in and said "cut it!"
How much hair did you cut off?
Like 7 inches? I didn't actually measure.
I like you with short hair.

I just couldn't take it. Haha. I went in thinking I was just gonna get a trim but then my hair got all knotted so I was like "just cut it!" I wish it were summer. Especially since we're not having a lot of snow.
